notex.app.download_pdf()[source]ÔÉÅ

Downloads the compiled PDF for a given project.

Returns:

The requested PDF file if available, else an error JSON.

Return type:

Response

notex.app.get_latest_files(project_id)[source]ÔÉÅ

Retrieve the latest LaTeX and PDF files for a project.

Parameters:

project_id (str) ‚Äì Unique identifier for the project.

Returns:

Paths to the .tex and .pdf files if they exist, else (None, None).

Return type:

tuple

notex.app.upload_file()[source]ÔÉÅ

Handles file uploads (PDFs or images) and converts them to LaTeX/PDF.

Returns:

JSON containing the project ID and the generated PDF path.
